wissayi – 20 tharagawaliye shri lanka sanchithaya ada nam kerunu athara ehi nayakathwaya pawara aththe thisara pererataya.ema sanchithayata test tharagawaliyata saha ekdina tharagawaliyata ek nowu kridakayan 11 deneku namkara thibima da wisheshathwayak.dilshan munawira / dhanushka gunathilaka / sadhira samarawikrama / ashan priyanjan / mahela udawaththa / dasun shanaka / minod bhanuka / sachith pathirana / wikum sanjaya / lahiru gamage / sikkuge prasanna / wishwa pranandu / isuru udana / jefri wandase saha chathuranga da silwa pakisthanayata erehi 20 yi 20 tharagawaliye shri lanka sanchithayata athulath.

siriyawathi hithuwe ehemaya.eekata ape jinadasaya,siriyawathita mathakwuye age minihaya.uu ra degodahariyak wanathuru kasippu pole wati kanamadaya men bigena gedarawith dorata thadibayi.dora hara jinawa geta ganna siriyawathi aapahu padure wathiri nidannata gani.mona nindakda?jina bima nidana siriyawathita payin ana aharawa anda udata gena pandara jamaya wenathuru dasawada deyi.uuta badagini wena welawata kama idi nothibunoth siriyawathita deyiyannema pihitaya.balu banum banimin diwaena jina siriyawathige konda wallen alla eliyata adagena awith midulata wisiwannata payin gasayi.siriyawathige kalpanawa bindune gunapala alen goda ena handinya.
